title: Unable to show weather info for this location - Pixel 5
content:
I have the same issue as seen on a similar post earlier this year - the weather displays accurately for my location in the "At a Glance" homescreen widget. However, when I click on the icon, I get the message "Unable to show weather info for this location." When I click in the "Search places" bar, I see an empty slot labeled "Your location", but it's blank. Normally it would list my actual location, London UK. 

This is not affecting Assistant features. When I ask, "What's the weather?" it is able to tell me the London weather.

I have done many things to try to fix this:
Reset App Permissions
Factor Reset Device
Check that Location is on and enabled for Google and Pixel Maps
Checked Roaming settings

Any thoughts on what could be causing this would be greatly appreciated.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
